name: Real Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D: Hunt for wolf, bear, tiger & survive in the jungle
name_original: Real Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D: Hunt for wolf, bear, tiger & survive in the jungle
description:
Giant anaconda is hungry and slithering out in the jungle searching for food. Play the role of ferocious giant snake and hunt down different wild animals to satisfy its hunger. Hide behind the trees and attack the animals quietly to make them shock. Real snake attack simulator offers you a realistic wildlife experience of controlling a giant snake in forest. That’s not only, your mission objective also includes killing elephants, wolf, lions, horses, zebras and hunters.

Live the adventures life of a huge snake with 15 wild challenging missions to survive and to satisfy the hunger. Play now and have real life animal’s safari fun which highlights the actual life of a wild snake. Chase and hunt down the animals to gain survival points to jump in the next levels of extreme challenges. To enhance your gaming experience multiple playing modes are available with free roam mode and mission mode.

 Features

-         Wildlife journey of anaconda in 15 challenging missions
-          Lion, horse, crocodile, elephant and wolf to hunt down
-          Multiple playing modes with free roam and mission mode
-          Realistic forest environment with HD graphics.
-          Lifelike jungles background sounds.
-          Smooth and user friendly controls.
